授業目的:
初級レベルに要求される基本的な英語の機能と文法を導入することにより、簡単な会話と作
文を含む日常生活での英語の運用能力を養成することを目指す。

自然な英語で交わされる簡単な会話を理解し、日常生活での表現を使用できるようにする
ことによって、英語で基本的なことがらを相手と話すことができるようにする。
到達目標:
リスニングとスピーキングでは、ロールプレイ、調査、歌、ゲームを含むペアワークとグル
ープワーク等を重要な部分とする授業を通して、英語のネイティブスピーカーが用いるコミ
ュニケーション・ストラテジーについての基本を身につけている。
リスニングとスピーキングの養成に加えて、初級の英文作成のパターンに習熟すること
により、簡単かつ効果的な英文を書くことができるようになる。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This is a communication focused course, classes will be based on interactive communication using a combination of pair and group work, to help boost students English communication abilities and vocabulary knowledge.
授業方法:
全員出席をもとに、ロールプレイ、調査, ゲームを含むペアワークとグループワークは授業
の中では特に重要な部分となる。
Students will develop their English communication skills by performing learning activities and holding
discussions in pairs, groups of four and whole class groups.
Sessions will be conducted 'face to face.'

第1回: Introduction, Orientation, course details to be explained. Students have to provided an oral and written self-introduction during class.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 1.
第2回: Unit 1. Getting to know each other. Students work on ideas and questions to ask people they meet for the first time. Part 1
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 2.
第3回: Unit 1. Getting to know each other. Students work on ideas and questions to ask people they meet for the first time. Part 2
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 3
第4回: Unit 2. Making Comparisons. Part 1. Students will work through activities based on the use of comparisons in practical situations.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 4.
第5回: Unit 2. Making Comparisons. Part 2. Students will work through activities based on the use of comparisons in practical situations.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 5.
第6回:
Unit 3. Talking about Work. Part 1. Students will work through communication activities based on the current and future work interests.
Students will also prepare for the mid-term presentation.
Students will prepare for mid-term presentation. This will be done in pairs.
第7回: Mid-term presentations. Students will preform short presentations in pairs based on materials covered so far in class.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 7.
第8回: Unit 3. Talking about Work. Part 2. Students will work through communication activities based on the current and future work interests.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 8.
第9回: Unit 4. Giving Directions.Part 1. Students will study vocabulary and converstaion patterns related to maps and giving directions
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 9.
第10回: Unit 4. Giving Directions.Part 2, Students will study vocabulary and converstaion patterns related to maps and giving directions
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 10.
第11回: Unit 5. Travel English Part 1. Students will begin a 3 part study of overseas travel. Part 1 in Korea
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 11.
第12回: Unit 5. Travel English Part 1. Students will begin a 3 part study of overseas travel. Part 2 in Hawaii
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 12.
第13回: Unit 5. Travel English Part 1. Students will begin a 3 part study of overseas travel. Part 3. Country of Students choice.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 13. They will also prepare their presentation contents.
第14回: End of term presentations. Students will preform short presentations in pairs based on materials covered so far in class.
Students will discuss final assessment and grading throughout the course
